configuration.source:
engine = new groovy.text.SimpleTemplateEngine() filter = ['paxPluginVersion':"${project.version}"]
pom = 'archetype-resources/pom.xml'
pomFile = new File( "${project.basedir}/src/main/resources/${pom}" ) template = engine.createTemplate( pomFile ).make( filter ) new File( "${project.build.outputDirectory}/${pom}" ).write( template.toString() )
